title: Troubleshoot Signal Data Logging from Inport in Referenced Model in Test Harness
introduction: A SimulinkÂ® Testâ¢ test harness is available for a Simulink Real-Timeâ¢ model. The model has a referenced model that contains an inport whose signal are marked for data logging in the Simulation Data Inspector. During testing, this error occurs:

chunks.heading: What This Issue Means
chunks.content: It is not possible to stream signal data from the referenced model inport for logging from within the test harness.

chunks.heading: Try This Workaround
chunks.content: Mark the input signals to the model block for logging. This model provides an example workaround. For more information, see the Simulink Test documentation.
